parameters.subject: Thank you for contacting Forward Horizon
parameters.message:
=Dear {{ $json.body.name }},

Thank you for reaching out to Forward Horizon. We have received your {{ $json.body.formType || 'contact' }} submission.

Your Message:
"{{ $json.body.message }}"

What happens next:
• Our team will review your inquiry within 24 hours
• You'll receive a call or email from our admissions team
• If urgent, please call us directly at (310) 488-5280

We're here to support you on your journey to stability and independence.

With hope and support,
The Forward Horizon Team

--
Forward Horizon
Transitional Housing for Veterans, Recovery & Reentry
Phone: (310) 488-5280
Email: admin@theforwardhorizon.com
Website: https://theforwardhorizon.com

parameters.responseBody: ={{ { "success": true, "message": "Thank you! We'll contact you within 24 hours.", "timestamp": $now } }}
